script:
1). How long have you wanted to work for yourself?
Until five years
Ever since college 
From 1999
2). Where did Mark say we should put these boxes?
He said we shouldn't put them in the basement.
He said we wouldn't carry them upstairs.
He said to store them in the lunch room. 
3). Haven't you heard about our merger?
No, nobody told me. 
I couldn't hear anything.
I had heard it once.
